thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: 007Like

author: 007Like
title: 007Like
text: Ordered nike zoom structure 20 in size 6. Although lovely runner, they came up on the big size. It is such a shame they do not do half sizes. Needed a 5.5. Fortunately got the same runner in size 5.5 from a competitors website. Delivery very quick to store and no hassle with returns. Very pleasant and helpful staff in Lifestyle Sports, Athlone, Golden Island.
